subject: Playoff Games
Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Joe Mauer’s ball had been called fair, he may have had a double and would have scored the go-ahead run for the Minnesota Twins because they followed his hit with back-to-back singles.
snippet: If Joe Mauer’s ball had been called fair, he may have had a double and would have scored the go-ahead run for the Minnesota Twins because they followed his hit with back-to-back singles.
